chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_156
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
∙ Ensure that ASHA provide follow-up visits after delivery to mother and child as per HBNC/HBYC.
 ∙ Provide at least 10% joint visits to high-risk cases with your team and 2 VHSND visits per month to support 
your team and provide genuine feedback after the visits and resolve any issues if they are facing at field level.
 ∙ Ensure that quality services are provided at VHSND by using VHSND supervision checklist such as services 
provided, availability of necessary equipment and drugs.
 ∙ Ensure
